column4: As a user, I want to create, update, delete teams.
As an admin, I want to manage assessment frameworks.
As a data scientist, I want to calculate MBTI/Big Five/DISC scores.
As a manager, I want to view analytics on a dashboard.
As a manager, I want AI recommendations for team composition.
As a user, I want Slack notifications for team insights.
As a user, I want to use the platform on mobile devices.
As an org, we must meet GDPR compliance.
As a app dev, I want 90% coverage.
As a QA, I want to test with beta users.
As a DevOps lead, I want production infra configured.
As a technical writer, I want docs ready before launch.
As a team, we want to execute the launch smoothly.
